title: SkillSetAcceptancePayload (SSA_Payload)
description: Schema for the payload of a Skill Set Acceptance (SSA) message in ACNBP (referred to as SSS in paper's diagram). Sent by a_req to a_prov_candidate to accept an offer. This payload is digitally signed.

messageId.description: Unique identifier for this SSA message.

inReplyToMessageId.description: The ID of the SSO message this acceptance is for.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the SSA was created.

requesterAgentId.description: The ANS name or unique ID of the Requester Agent (a_req).

acceptedCapabilityId.description: The capability ID from the accepted SSO.

acceptedSkillSet.description: The specific skill set accepted by a_req, as detailed in the SSO.

confirmedNegotiationContext.description: The requester's negotiation context, confirming the basis of acceptance.

confirmedRequesterProtocolExtension.description: The requester's ProtocolExtension, as presented in the SSR, for final confirmation.

acceptanceDetails.description: Optional: Any additional details or confirmations from the requester.
